title: LA-24-15: Answers to Frequently Asked Questions About Widely Attended Gatherings
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/BC042C0B8CE3B19B85258BCF005758D4/$FILE/LA-24-15 Answers to Frequently Asked Questions About Widely Attended Gatherings.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory provides answers to frequently asked questions about the gift exception for widely attended gatherings (WAGs) found at 5 C.F.R. § 2635.204(g).
